Name: Kōmori Fruit Rush
About the game: Kȯmori Fruit Rush is a Hyper-Casual game, where you help Kȯmori, a small fruit bat achieve his main goal in life... Catching delicious fruit of course, while surviving dangers associated with the day to day life of a fruit bat. Can you help Kȯmori survive ? Main Features : A object/fruit catching game with a few twists from the norm Multiple Difficulties Multiple Leader boards Quests Rush Mode Difficulty Modes : Beginner mode is a damage free zone which has specifically been designed for parents, to allow their kids to go wild with a mouse while learning how to control it. Legend mode was designed with the more casual elite and leader board hungry players in mind. Those whom love the challenge of striving to be and staying the best will be drawn to this mode.
